collection:
This Privacy Policy
outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of your
information through the use of our websites and applications ("Services").

Information Collection**  
We collect information that you provide directly to us, which may include
personal details such as your name, email address, and other contact
information.

Additionally, we may collect certain information automatically
when you use our Services, including but not limited to, usage details, IP
addresses, and information collected through cookies and other tracking
technologies.

Use of Information**  
The information we collect is primarily used to provide, maintain, and improve
our Services.
sharing:
This Privacy Policy
outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of your
information through the use of our websites and applications ("Services").

Sharing of Information**  
Cybrix.ai does not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.

We only
share information as necessary to provide our Services, such as with third-
party service providers who assist us in our operations.

Any sharing of data
is done in compliance with applicable law and under contractual protections
that safeguard your privacy.
